resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108080</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108080</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206160</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Global Warming Debate</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Globale Wärmende Debatte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Discussion de Chauffage Globale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Debate Aquecendo-se Global</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dibattito Di Riscaldamento Globale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σφαιρική συζήτηση θέρμανσης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Discusión Que se calienta Global</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">discusses global warming, policy struggles to address it, international efforts, the idea of a cap-and-trade system, and more. Interactive features show how much CO2 different cars produce and how populations around the world may have to adapt to climate changes in 100 years.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">behandelt das globale Wärmen, Politikkämpfe, zum
sie, internationale Bemühungen zu adressieren, 
Schutzkappe-und-handeln die Idee von System und mehr. 
Interaktive Merkmale zeigen, daß wieviel CO2 unterschiedliche 
Autos produzieren und wie Bevölkerungen um die Welt Klima sich 
anpassen müssen können, ändert in 100 Jahren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">discute le chauffage global, luttes de politique 
pour l'adresser, efforts internationaux, l'idée de 
l'chapeau-et-commercent le système, et plus. Les dispositifs 
interactifs montrent que combien CO2 les différentes voitures 
produisent et comment les populations autour du monde peuvent devoir 
s'adapter au climat change en 100 ans.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">discute aquecer-se global, esforços da política 
para dirigir-se lhe, esforços internacionais, a idéia do 
tampão-e-negocía o sistema, e o mais. As características 
interativas mostram que quanto CO2 os carros diferentes produzem e 
como as populações em torno do mundo podem ter que se adaptar ao 
clima muda em 100 anos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">discute il riscaldamento globale, lotte di 
politica per richiamarlo, sforzi internazionali, l'idea 
dell'protezione-e-commercia il sistema e più. Le 
caratteristiche interattive mostrano che quanto CO2 gli automobili 
differenti producono e come le popolazioni intorno al mondo possono 
dovere adattarsi al clima cambia durante 100 anni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">συζητά την παγκόσμια αύξηση της θερμοκρασίας λόγω του
φαινομένου του θερμοκηπίου, τις πολιτικές προσπάθειες να 
εξεταστεί, τις διεθνείς προσπάθειες, την ιδέα ενός 
ΚΑΠ-ΚΑΙ-ΕΜΠΟΡΙΚΟΎ συστήματος, και περισσότερων. Τα διαλογικά
χαρακτηριστικά γνωρίσματα εμφανίζουν πόσα διαφορετικά αυτοκίνητα
του CO2 παράγουν και πώς οι πληθυσμοί σε όλο τον κόσμο μπορεί
να πρέπει να προσαρμοστούν στις αλλαγές κλίματος σε 100 έτη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">discute calentarse global, luchas de la política 
para tratarlo, esfuerzos internacionales, la idea del 
casquillo-y-negocia el sistema, y más. Las características 
interactivas muestran que cuánto CO2 producen diversos coches y cómo
las poblaciones alrededor del mundo pueden tener que adaptarse al 
clima cambia en 100 años.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206160</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>108080</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/global-warming-debate</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
